item.title: DeepSeek 将共享部分人工智能模型代码，加倍努力开源
item.description: 中国初创公司 DeepSeek 周五表示，将公开其模型代码，加倍履行其对开源人工智能的承诺。【原文：Chinese startup DeepSeek will make its models' code publicly available, it said on Friday, doubling down on its commitment to open-source artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 东京燃气将以 1.3 亿美元向静冈燃气出售美国页岩气股份
item.description: 日本最大的城市燃气供应商东京燃气公司（Tokyo Gas）周五表示，根据一项旨在提高效率的资产组合审查，该公司将以 1.3 亿美元的价格向静冈燃气公司（Shizuoka Gas）出售其在得克萨斯州南部伊格尔福特页岩气项目中持有的 25% 股份。【原文：Tokyo Gas , Japan's biggest city gas supplier, will sell its 25% stake in an Eagle Ford shale gas project in south Texas to Shizuoka Gas for $130 million under an asset portfolio review to improve efficiency, it said on Friday.】

item.title: 前政策制定者白井称日本央行可能在 3 月加息
item.description: 日本央行前董事会成员白井小百合（Sayuri Shirai）周五表示，如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）推进其关税威胁，并加剧已经日益加剧的国内通胀压力，日本央行可能会在3月份加息。【原文：The Bank of Japan may raise interest rates in March if U.S. President Donald Trump pushes through on his tariff threats and adds to already mounting domestic inflationary pressures, former central bank board member Sayuri Shirai said on Friday.】

item.title: 天秤座丑闻后，与政治家有关的纪念币适得其反
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）的支持让一种加密货币短暂飙升，随后又暴跌，这种加密货币是一系列面临反弹的政治代言纪念币中最新的一种。【原文：A cryptocurrency that briefly surged on Argentine President Javier Milei's support before crashing is the latest in a series of politically endorsed meme coins facing a backlash.】

item.title: 比亚迪方成宝推出具有先进自动驾驶功能的插电式混合动力汽车
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪旗下越野车品牌方成宝周五推出了插电式混合动力 SUV 宝 5 的智能版。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD's , off-road brand Fangchengbao on Friday launched smart versions of its plug-in hybrid SUV Bao 5.】

item.title: 意大利反垄断机构就斯泰伦特、大众、特斯拉和比亚迪误导消费者信息展开调查
item.description: 意大利反垄断机构周五表示，已对比亚迪、Stellantis、特斯拉和大众汽车展开调查，原因是它们涉嫌在电动汽车上误导消费者信息。【原文：Italy's antitrust agency said on Friday it had opened a probe on BYD , Stellantis , Tesla and Volkswagen for allegedly misleading consumer information on their electric vehicles.】

item.title: 英国因债券信息交换对四家银行罚款 1.27 亿美元
item.description: 英国竞争监管机构周五表示，四家全球性银行将因交换有关英国国债的敏感信息而支付总额超过 1 亿英镑（1.267 亿美元）的罚款。 政府债券的敏感信息。【原文：UK's competition regulator said on Friday four global banks would pay fines totalling more than 100 million pounds ($126.7 million) for exchanging sensitive information about UK government bonds.】

item.title: 聚焦：米兰房地产热潮减退，投资者将目光投向了焕然一新的罗马
item.description: 意大利建筑师朱塞佩-佩扎诺（Giuseppe Pezzano）曾在米兰进行过房地产投资，现在他正在罗马寻找一个地方建立第二个家和工作室，因为意大利首都欠发达的房地产行业吸引了新的关注。【原文：Having made property investments in Milan, Italian architect Giuseppe Pezzano is now looking for a place in Rome to set up a second home and studio, as the Italian capital's underdeveloped real estate sector draws fresh attention.】

item.title: 西班牙经济繁荣给一些人带来寒冷的安慰
item.description: 萨拉-韦尔塔斯（Sara Huertas）30 岁时仍与父母住在一起，因为她的代课老师工资不足以让她与伴侣在马德里租房居住。【原文：Sara Huertas still lives with her parents at age 30 because her supply teacher salary doesn't pay enough for her to rent a home in Madrid with her partner.】

item.title: 日本央行目前并不担心债券收益率上升
item.description: 日本政府债券市场的投资者正在领略没有日本央行严厉干预下的生活，尽管近期长期利率稳步上升，但日本央行几乎没有迹象表明要重新采取 "亲力亲为 "的做法。【原文：Investors in Japan's government bond market are getting a glimpse of life without heavy intervention by the Bank of Japan, which is showing little sign of reverting to a hands-on approach despite the recent steady rise in long-term interest rates.】

item.title: 俄罗斯的威胁迫在眉睫，爱沙尼亚的科技投资者将防务掌握在自己手中
item.description: 爱沙尼亚是一个拥有 140 万人口的波罗的海国家，长期以来在科技领域一枝独秀，如今在俄罗斯 2022 年入侵乌克兰的刺激下，爱沙尼亚正引领着中欧和东欧为国防项目提供资金的热潮。【原文：Estonia, a Baltic country of 1.4 million people that has long punched far above its weight in the tech sector, is now leading central and eastern Europe's rush to fund defence projects spurred by Russia's 2022 invasion of Ukraine.】

item.title: 电动交通工具团体敦促欧盟不要放宽二氧化碳排放规定
item.description: 两个欧洲电动交通组织周五致信欧盟委员会主席乌苏拉-冯德莱恩（Ursula von der Leyen），称欧盟应拒绝欧洲汽车制造商提出的削弱2025年汽车二氧化碳排放目标和相关罚款的要求。【原文：The European Union should reject European automakers' push to weaken 2025 CO2 car emission targets and related fines, two European electric transport groups wrote in a letter to European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen on Friday.】

item.title: AustralianSuper 因未合并重复账户被罚款 1700 万美元
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的养老基金 AustralianSuper 被罚款 2700 万澳元（1730 万美元），因为法院发现该基金未能识别和合并重复的成员账户。【原文：AustralianSuper, the country's largest pension fund, was fined A$27 million ($17.3 million) after a court found it had failed to identify and merge duplicate member accounts, the corporate watchdog said on Friday.】

item.title: 早间新闻周末德国大选前PMI成为焦点
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁为欧洲公司第四季度业绩蒙上阴影
item.description: 欧洲股市本月创下历史新高，因为各公司第四季度营收超出预期，但该地区高管们谈论的主要话题是美国关税。【原文：European stocks have hit record highs this month, as companies have beat fourth-quarter revenue expectations, but the topic that dominates the conversation among executives in the region is U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，日本将就日产汽车投资事宜向特斯拉求助
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周五报道，在日产汽车与竞争对手本田的合并谈判破裂后，一个包括前首相在内的日本高层小组为埃隆-马斯克的特斯拉投资日产汽车制定了计划。【原文：A high-level Japanese group that includes a former prime minister has drawn up plans for Elon Musk's Tesla to invest in Nissan , following the collapse of its merger talks with rival Honda , the Financial Times reported on Friday.】

item.title: 欧盟寻求更多美国天然气和可再生能源以替代俄罗斯供应
item.description: 欧盟已承诺到 2027 年放弃使用俄罗斯化石燃料。【原文：The EU has pledged to quit Russian fossil fuels by 2027.】

item.title: 中国监管放宽希望照亮离岸股权筹资前景
item.description: 中国政府支持民营企业的希望推动了投资者情绪的反弹，这些公司主要是科技行业的公司。【原文：Companies, mainly those in the tech sector, are tapping into a rebound in investor sentiment fueled by hopes of Beijing's support for private firms.】

item.title: 穆迪将日产汽车评级下调至垃圾级，并维持负面展望
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）周五表示，已将日产汽车公司的信用评级下调一级至垃圾级，理由是这家日本汽车制造商的信用状况疲软且前景恶化。【原文：Moody's Ratings said on Friday it has downgraded its rating of Nissan Motor's credit by one notch to junk status, citing a weak and worsening outlook for the Japanese automaker's credit profile.】

item.title: 通胀压力下政府采取措施，东京 2 月通胀可能放缓 - 路透社调查
item.description: 路透社周五的一项民意调查显示，由于政府重新采取了减轻能源账单负担的措施，2月份东京的消费者通胀可能有所放缓。【原文：Consumer inflation in Tokyo likely slowed down in February as the government reinstated steps to ease the burden from energy bills as higher living costs haunt persistent inflation presser, a Reuters poll showed on Friday.】

item.title: StanChart 年度利润增长 18%，与预期基本一致
item.description: 渣打银行周五报告称，由于财富和市场业务表现强劲，其年度利润增长了 18%，与分析师的预期基本一致。【原文：Standard Chartered reported on Friday its annual profit rose 18%, roughly in line with analysts' estimates, on strong performance of its wealth and markets business.】

item.title: 需求前景明朗，中国刺激政策有望出台，铁矿石周线收涨
item.description: 周五，铁矿石期货价格攀升至四个多月来的最高水平，并有望实现单周上涨，原因是钢铁消费复苏的迹象提振了第一大消费国中国的需求前景，而中国实施更多刺激政策的希望再次燃起。【原文：Iron ore futures prices climbed on Friday to their highest levels in more than four months and headed for a weekly gain, as signs of recovery in steel consumption brightened demand outlook in top consumer China where hopes of more stimulus revived.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，Abrdn 将与中信旗下公司成立中国资产管理公司
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，Abrdn 正与中信银行就在中国成立一家资产管理合资企业进行深入谈判，这家英国公司正寻求加强其在世界第二大经济体的影响力。【原文：Abrdn is in advanced talks with Citic Bank to launch an asset management joint venture in China, two people with knowledge of the matter said, as the British firm looks to bolster its presence in the world's second-largest economy.】

item.title: 特朗普寻求用美国天然气重塑亚洲能源供应格局
item.description: 当唐纳德-特朗普总统本月与日本总统共进午餐时，话题很快转向东京如何帮助实现一项数十年之久的建议，即释放阿拉斯加的天然气并将其运往美国在亚洲的盟国。【原文：When President Donald Trump sat down to lunch with his Japanese counterpart this month, talk turned quickly to how Tokyo could help realise a decades-old proposal to unlock gas in Alaska and ship it to U.S. allies in Asia.】

item.title: 亚洲股市受中国提振，黄金连续第八周上涨
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市上涨，扭转了华尔街的不利局面，因为美国的例外论继续失去光芒，而一度不被看好的中国股市则因人工智能（AI）的乐观情绪而找到了更多买家。【原文：Asian shares rose on Friday, reversing Wall Street's negative lead as the U.S. exceptionalism narrative continued to lose its shine, while once unloved Chinese stocks found themselves more buyers thanks to optimism over artificial intelligence (AI).】

item.title: 中国 CATL 将与大众汽车深化电池研发合作
item.description: 中国电动汽车电池巨头 CATL 周五表示，已与大众汽车签署战略合作谅解备忘录，双方将在电池研发、新材料应用和零部件开发等领域深化合作。【原文：CATL has signed a strategic cooperation MOU with Volkswagen to deepen partnership in battery R&D, new materials application and components development, the Chinese electric vehicle battery giant said on Friday.】

item.title: 贝莱德在审查新的 ESG 指南后恢复监管会谈
item.description: 顶级资产管理公司贝莱德（BlackRock）周四表示，在审查了美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）的新指导意见后，该公司已恢复了与公司的监管合作。【原文：Top asset manager BlackRock said on Thursday it had resumed stewardship engagements with companies after reviewing new guidance from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行对降息持谨慎态度，一切取决于数据
item.description: 澳大利亚央行高级官员周五表示，鉴于劳动力市场火热带来的成本压力，澳大利亚央行对进一步降息持谨慎态度，但如果通胀放缓速度超过预期，澳大利亚央行将做出反应。【原文：Australia's central bank is cautious about cutting rates further given cost pressures in a hot labour market, but it will respond if inflation slows more quickly than expected, senior officials said on Friday.】

item.title: 美国需求希望强烈，俄罗斯供应令人担忧，石油延续涨势
item.description: 由于美国汽油和馏分油库存下降提高了人们对稳健需求的预期，同时对俄罗斯供应中断的担忧也为油价提供了支撑，油价周五扩大涨幅，有望实现单周上涨。【原文：Oil prices extended gains on Friday, headed for a weekly increase, as falling inventories of U.S. gasoline and distillate raised expectations of solid demand while concerns over supply disruptions in Russia lent support.】

item.title: 国营媒体称，华为创始人告诉习近平，中国对缺乏芯片的担忧有所缓解
item.description: 据中国国家媒体报道，华为创始人在中国国家主席与私营企业家举行的一次会议上告诉习近平，中国对缺乏国产芯片或操作系统的担忧有所缓解。【原文：Huawei's founder told Xi Jinping at a meeting the Chinese president held with private sector entrepreneurs that concerns China had about a lack of homegrown chips or operating systems had eased, Chinese state media reported.】
